title: Encaustic Workshop: Artistic Techniques for Working with Wax
description:
Encaustic Workshop: Artistic Techniques for Working with Wax

2009 | ISBN: 1600611060 | English | 128 pages | EPUB | 6 MB


Find out what happens when mixed media meets melted mediumIn its purest form, encaustic painting is as simple as applying melted beeswax to an absorbent surface. In Encaustic Workshop, it becomes much more: a dynamic medium where anything goes and the possibilities are endless.Packed with step-by-step techniques, helpful tips and diverse examples of completed works, Encaustic Workshop brings all the accessibility and excitement of a mixed-media workshop to your own workspace. If you're a beginner, you'll find everything you need to know to get started
